titles.title: Jesus My Sorrow Lies Too Deep (easy ok)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my sorrow Lies too deep For human ministry It knows not how To tell itself To any but to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou dost remember Still amid The glories of God's Throne The sorrows of Mortality For they were once Thine own{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my fainting Spirit brings Its fearfulness to Thee Thine eye at least Can penetrate The clouded mystery{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And is it not enough Enough This holy sympathy There is no sorrow e'er so deep But I may bring to Thee{/lang-eng}
